title: [Large-Scale] Building a Mathematics Education Community Using Social Networking Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented mathematics education program for working professionals, enhancing knowledge sharing and collaboration among learners via social networking platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can establish collaborative systems with peers during mathematical problem-solving processes using social networking platforms
Learners can effectively share knowledge in online mathematics communities through digital expertise modeling
Learners can analyze application cases of mathematical concepts and provide feedback through professional communication within the platform

resources: Social networking platforms (e.g., LinkedIn Learning, Slack)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
